typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpId as short,
		EmpName as string,
		department as short,
		Country as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
source(output(
		DepID as short,
		DeptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> department
employees, department join(department == DepID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 window(over(Department = DeptName),
	asc(Salary, true),
	AvgSalary = avg(Salary)) ~> Window1
Join1 window(over(Department = DeptName),
	desc(Salary, true),
	Ranking = denseRank()) ~> Window2
Window1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['windowoutput.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		EmpName,
		Country,
		Gender,
		Salary,
		DeptName,
		AvgSalary
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
Window2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[''],
	mapColumn(
		EmpId,
		EmpName,
		Country,
		Gender,
		Salary,
		DeptName,
		Ranking
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
